verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> to bring to remembrance. <S%H2142><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> rebuke <S%H3198><s%> me not <S%H408><s%> in thy wrath: <S%H7110><s%> neither chasten <S%H3256><s%> me in thy hot displeasure. <S%H2534><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> thine arrows <S%H2671><s%> stick fast <S%H5181><s%> in me, and thy hand <S%H3027><s%> presseth me sore. <S%H5181><s%> <S%H5921><s%>

There is no <S%H369><s%> soundness <S%H4974><s%> in my flesh <S%H1320><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of thine anger; <S%H2195><s%> neither <S%H369><s%> is there any rest <S%H7965><s%> in my bones <S%H6106><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of my sin. <S%H2403><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> mine iniquities <S%H5771><s%> are gone over <S%H5674><s%> mine head: <S%H7218><s%> as a heavy <S%H3515><s%> burden <S%H4853><s%> they are too heavy <S%H3513><s%> for <S%H4480><s%> me.
My wounds <S%H2250><s%> stink <S%H887><s%> and are corrupt <S%H4743><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of my foolishness. <S%H200><s%>
I am troubled; <S%H5753><s%> I am bowed down <S%H7817><s%> greatly; <S%H5704><s%> <S%H3966><s%> I go <S%H1980><s%> mourning <S%H6937><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> long.
For <S%H3588><s%> my loins <S%H3689><s%> are filled <S%H4390><s%> with a loathsome <S%H7033><s%> disease: and there is no <S%H369><s%> soundness <S%H4974><s%> in my flesh. <S%H1320><s%>
I am feeble <S%H6313><s%> and sore <S%H5704><s%> <S%H3966><s%> broken: <S%H1794><s%> I have roared <S%H7580><s%> by reason of the disquietness <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5100><s%> of my heart. <S%H3820><s%>
Lord, <S%H136><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my desire <S%H8378><s%> is before <S%H5048><s%> thee; and my groaning <S%H585><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> hid <S%H5641><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> thee.

My heart <S%H3820><s%> panteth, <S%H5503><s%> my strength <S%H3581><s%> faileth <S%H5800><s%> me: as for the light <S%H216><s%> of mine eyes, <S%H5869><s%> it <S%H1992><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> is gone <S%H369><s%> from <S%H854><s%> me.

My lovers <S%H157><s%> and my friends <S%H7453><s%> stand aloof <S%H5975><s%> from my sore; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5048><s%> <S%H5061><s%> and my kinsmen <S%H7138><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> afar off. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7350><s%>

They also that seek after <S%H1245><s%> my life <S%H5315><s%> lay snares <S%H5367><s%> for me: and they that seek <S%H1875><s%> my hurt <S%H7451><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> mischievous things, <S%H1942><s%> and imagine <S%H1897><s%> deceits <S%H4820><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> long.
But I, <S%H589><s%> as a deaf <S%H2795><s%> man, heard <S%H8085><s%> not; <S%H3808><s%> and I was as a dumb man <S%H483><s%> that openeth <S%H6605><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> his mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
Thus I was <S%H1961><s%> as a man <S%H376><s%> that <S%H834><s%> heareth <S%H8085><s%> not, <S%H3808><s%> and in whose mouth <S%H6310><s%> are no <S%H369><s%> reproofs. <S%H8433><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> in thee, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> do I hope: <S%H3176><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> wilt hear, <S%H6030><s%> O Lord <S%H136><s%> my God. <S%H430><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> I said, <S%H559><s%> Hear me, lest <S%H6435><s%> otherwise they should rejoice <S%H8055><s%> over me: when my foot <S%H7272><s%> slippeth, <S%H4131><s%> they magnify <S%H1431><s%> themselves against <S%H5921><s%> me.
For <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am ready <S%H3559><s%> to halt, <S%H6761><s%> and my sorrow <S%H4341><s%> is continually <S%H8548><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> me.
For <S%H3588><s%> I will declare <S%H5046><s%> mine iniquity; <S%H5771><s%> I will be sorry <S%H1672><s%> for my sin. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2403><s%>
But mine enemies <S%H341><s%> are lively, <S%H2416><s%> and they are strong: <S%H6105><s%> and they that hate <S%H8130><s%> me wrongfully <S%H8267><s%> are multiplied. <S%H7231><s%>

They also that render <S%H7999><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> for <S%H8478><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> are mine adversaries; <S%H7853><s%> because <S%H8478><s%> I follow <S%H7291><s%> the thing that good <S%H2896><s%> is.
Forsake <S%H5800><s%> me not, <S%H408><s%> O LORD: <S%H3068><s%> O my God, <S%H430><s%> be not <S%H408><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> me.
Make haste <S%H2363><s%> to help <S%H5833><s%> me, O Lord <S%H136><s%> my salvation. <S%H8668><s%>
